comments:
We run the following code inside a builder:

      resTemp = WorkbenchResourceHelperBase.load(workspace.getFile
(webServicesTempXMLPath));
      WebServices webServicesTemp = (WebServices)resTemp.getContents().get(0);
      EList eList = webServicesTemp.getWebServiceDescriptions();
      for (int i=0;i<eList.size();i++)
      {
      	WebServiceDescription wsdpTemp = (WebServiceDescription)eList.get(i);
        if (webServiceDescriptions.get(wsdpTemp.getWebServiceDescriptionName
()) != null)
        {
        	eList.remove(i);
        	i--;
        }
      }
      for (Iterator i=webServiceDescriptions.values().iterator();i.hasNext();)
      {
      	WebServiceDescription wsDesc = (WebServiceDescription)i.next();
      	eList.add(wsDesc);
      }
      resTemp.save(null);

where resTemp is an EMF Resource. During the final call to resTemp.save(null),
an invalid thread access exception is logged and prevents merging of deployment
descriptors:
